title: The Bachelorette's Ciarran Stott reveals his had a nose job
text:
He's the long-haired Englishman who has impressed Angie Kent with his good looks and confidence.

But on Wednesday, Ciarran Stott revealed that not everything about his appearance was natural.

While enjoying one-on-one time with Angie, the 25-year-old admitted: 'Well I had a nose job last year. I was proper self conscious about it.'

Ciarran left the blonde surprised as explained it was a lack of confidence about his appearance that inspired him to go under the knife.

'Well it's a nice looking nose now,' a stunned Angie said as Cirarran than joked: 'Well it should be for the money that I paid for it.'

During a piece-to-camera, he continued to explain that he didn't like the shape of his natural nose.

'I had a nose job last year': On Wednesday night's episode, The Bachelorette's Ciarran Stott (pictured) admitted to Angie Kent that he underwent a nose job last year

Revelation: While enjoying one-on-one with Angie (pictured), he revealed: 'Well I had a nose job last year. I was proper self conscious about it'

Surprise: Ciarran (far right) explained that he didn't like his side profile and had it 'all trimmed down and looking nice and schmick'. Pictured in August 2017

'So I got it all trimmed down and looking nice and schmick... the ladies love it now,' he said.

The revelation came just moments after Ciarran had opened up about his raunchy past as a dancer.

'I used to dance in a gay bar.., with, like, drag queens. It was carnage, but it was so much fun!' he mused.

Candid: The revelation came just moments after Ciarran (pictured left) had revealed his raunchy past as a dancer

In 2016, Ciarran regularly performed on stage in skimpy underwear alongside drag queens at Darwin's leading gay nightclub, Throb.

He even starred in a Christmas show called 'Camp Christmas: Freezn', which was inspired by the Disney movie Frozen.

A friend of Ciarran's told Daily Australia: 'He's not gay but has always been the centre of attention and loved being up on the stage.'
description: He's the long-haired Englishman who has impressed Angie Kent with his good looks and confidence.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
